backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with authorization, blob storage, user profiles, observations, kaizens, photos, operator activity, maintenance mode, and admin bootstrap logic.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping features to files, components, tests, and confidence levels for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files detailing their purpose and role in the application.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder with no content.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML bootstrap file that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the application's routing, authentication guards, layout, and page components using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Authentication guard enforcing login, maintenance mode restrictions, and admin bootstrap conditions.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Enforces role-based access (admin only) and displays an access-denied message when permissions are insufficient.
frontend/src/components/empty/EmptyState: Reusable empty-state component showing optional image, text, and action button.
frontend/src/components/kaizen/KaizenAss: Panel allowing managers to assign a department and required tools to a Kaizen item with validation and mutation API calls.
frontend/src/components/kaizen/KaizenDec: Provides approve/reject UI for a Kaizen item with comment input and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/kaizen/KaizenPho: Displays a grid of implementation photos for a Kaizen, with loading and empty states.
Allows users to upload image files for a Kaizen with validation and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/kaizen/KaizenSta: Renders a status badge for a Kaizen item based on predefined variants.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header with navigation, user menu, admin links, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Simple layout wrapper applying container styling around children.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal dialog for initial user profile creation with name and fixed role.
Sends periodic activity pings when the user is logged in and the page is visible.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the app’s backend actor instance, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Hooks for fetching the caller’s user profile and checking admin status via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context and login/logout handling using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating observations, kaizens, and related admin actions using an authenticated actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers, then renders the root component.
Provides a one-time admin initialization flow allowing the first user to bootstrap admin access and proceed to manager tools.
frontend/src/pages/admin/MaintenanceMode: Displays and toggles system maintenance mode using API hooks, showing loading and status alerts. Handles optimistic UI updates with local state and toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/admin/RoleManagementP: Allows admins to look up users by principal ID and assign roles, showing onboarding instructions and role assignment results. Uses API hooks for lookup and role mutation.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard showing observation and kaizen stats, access-denied alerts, and recent activity.
frontend/src/pages/kaizen/KaizenDetailPa: Shows detailed information for a single Kaizen entry with admin-only decision and assignment controls. Includes photo upload, status display, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/kaizen/KaizenListPage: Lists Kaizen suggestions with filtering, searching, and role-based visibility for operators and admins. Provides navigation to create new entries and view details.
Form for submitting a new Kaizen suggestion with validation and API submission. On success, shows a toast and redirects to the Kaizen list.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login with role-based intents and redirects, showing different options for operator, manager, and admin.
frontend/src/pages/MaintenancePage.tsx: Displays a maintenance-mode notice with sign‑out functionality while the app is unavailable.
frontend/src/pages/manager/AnalyticsPage: Displays analytics for observations and kaizens, including totals, trends, top areas, approval rate, and average decision time.
frontend/src/pages/manager/GapsPage.tsx: Identifies low-activity areas and departments using submission data and shows them in tables with alerts.
frontend/src/pages/manager/InactivityDas: Shows operators inactive for a configurable number of days and allows exporting results to CSV.
frontend/src/pages/manager/OperatorActiv: Displays all operator activity with sorting, inactivity calculation, and activity summaries.
frontend/src/pages/observations/Observat: Shows full details of a single observation including metadata, timestamps, type, and status.
Provides a form to submit a new observation including type, title, description, and optional area.
Displays a filterable and searchable list of observations, limiting visibility based on user role and allowing navigation to create new observations.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Provides analytics utilities for submissions, including time-series counts, area rankings, approval rates, decision-time averages, and low-activity detection.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Generates and triggers download of a CSV file from an array of records.
frontend/src/utils/loginSelection.ts: Manages login intent and access-denied flags using sessionStorage for operator, manager, and admin flows.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting both query and hash-based routing with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Documents current project state, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for ongoing feature development and login workflow changes.
